description.value:
This green-and-blue stalk is topped with a clump of small flowers resembling broccoli. It's covered in a mildly toxic resin that sticks to flesh, fur, and equipment alike, causing affected creatures to break out in an itchy rash.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

Onset 1 day

Maximum Duration 2 weeks

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}, and the sickened condition can't go below 1 (1 day)

Stage 2 as stage 1, but also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} (1 day)

publication.title: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powder Keg
